module.title: Text/HTML
module.content: <htmltext><content><![CDATA[<div class="is-section is-section-md-50 is-box is-align-center layout-no-mb is-section-100"> <div class="is-overlay"> <div class="is-overlay-bg" style="background-image: url('{{PortalRoot}}ThemePluginPro/uploads/2020/9/22/Vive-Static-v5.jpg'); background-size: cover; background-position: 50% 100%;"> <div class="is-overlay-color" style="opacity: 0.125; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); display: block;"></div> </div> <div class="is-overlay-content"></div> </div> <div class="is-boxes"> <div class="is-box-centered"> <div class="is-container container-fluid" dragwithouthandle=""> <div class="row"> <div class="col-md-12"> <h1 class="size-60" style="color: rgb(239, 239, 239);">Gezond zijn was nog nooit zo makkelijk</h1> <div class="spacer height-40"></div> <p style="color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-size: 1.5em;">Er zijn honderden vitamines, mineralen en andere voedingsstoffen. <br> Ortomo stemt ze af op jou en bezorgt ze ook nog.</p> <p></p> <div> <a href="#" title="Learn more" class="button-01 border-radius-3 mt-10 mb-5 mb-lg-10">Doe de test</a> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>]]></content></htmltext>
